home_block1_title: What would you like to do?
sign_in_title: Welcome to the Green Signature Broker Interface!
sign_in_h5_0: Here you can manage all your business agreements easily and efficiently.
sign_in_h5_1: The system allows you to send various agreements, create properties, clients, and agents,
sign_in_h5_2: generate invoices, track commissions, match properties to clients, send update
sign_in_h5_3: messages to potential customers, and more.
sign_in_in_label: Before you begin, please enter your brokerage license number.
search_placeholder: Search agreement by address / client name
invoice_placeholder: Search invoice by address / client name
subject: Subject
subscriptionSettings: On this page, you can customize your subscription settings according to your personal preferences.
showCommissionAmounts: Display brokerage commission amounts on the homepage
notificationsSettings: Additionally, you can choose how to receive notifications and information, whether in general or for each section of this page individually.
selectChannels: Select the sending channels for reminders, reports, and customer notifications
receivePerformanceReports: Receive performance reports based on commission amounts
changeReportsSettings: Change the way reports are received
notifyOnPropertyMatch: Send a notification to the customer when a suitable property is found
notifyOnPriceDropInterested: Send a notification to customers who were interested in a property when its price drops
notifyOnPriceDropAll: Send a notification to all matched customers (based on tags) when the property price drops
changePushNotificationSettings: Change the way push notifications are sent to customers
receiveReminderWhen: I want to receive a reminder when:
interestedClientsNoAgreement: There are interested clients who have not yet signed the agreement
changeReminderSettings: Change the way reminders are received
sendMessage: Send a message{{spanText}} in the property when its price drops
toAllClientsFoundSuitable: to all clients who were found suitable
sendMessageTags: (according to tags) when the property price drops
ownertitle: Display Commissions on the Home Page
lable1: Show only my brokerage commission amounts
lable2: Show brokerage commission amounts for all office agents
search_placeholder_all: Search agreement by address / client name
description_1: You have arrived at our matching page. The system scans data and allows you to find
description_2: matches between clients and properties easily. In this tab, you can find all properties
description_3: that have been found suitable for the requested client.
description_4: matches between clients and properties easily. In this tab, you can find all clients
description_5: that have been found suitable for the requested property.
description: For sale: a spacious and bright house in a quiet and desirable neighborhood. The house is equipped with everything needed for a comfortable and pleasant life, including a private parking, storage room, and a balcony with an open view.
send1_to_client: Send this page to the client
property_type: Private house for sale, secure room
property_description: Spacious and bright house for sale in a quiet and desirable neighborhood. The house is equipped with everything needed for a comfortable and pleasant life, including private parking, storage, and a balcony with a beautiful view. It is very suitable for a family or a couple looking for a beautiful place to live. For more details and to schedule a meeting, please contact via email or phone.
furniture_details: Furniture details: The apartment is in excellent condition. Central air conditioning, new junkers, closets in the rooms, modern kitchen, and a semi-integrated dishwasher.
welcome_message: Welcome to the agent management page!
instructions_1: Here you can create new agents and become an office owner.
instructions_2: You can manage and track your agents' performance.
free_plan: With the FREE plan, you can add only one agent.
upgrade_plan: If you want to add more agents, you can upgrade your plan.
